parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the seat belt retractor can cause the seat belt to remain loose or extended, compromising the safety of the occupant in the event of an accident or sudden stop.
symptoms: The seat belt fails to retract
the seat belt remains loose or extended
the seat belt latch is defective
the seat belt retractor mechanism fails
the seat belt bolt comes loose from the floor.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the steering column can cause the driver to lose control of the vehicle, leading to accidents or near-misses.
symptoms: The steering wheel severs from the steering rack
the vehicle becomes difficult to control.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Corrosion of the steering system components can cause the loss of steering control, leading to accidents or near-misses.
symptoms: The rear cradle bolts pull through the retainers
the steering gear box is affected by rust.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the power steering system can cause the loss of steering control, leading to accidents or near-misses.
The failure of the tilt steering lever can cause inconvenience and discomfort to the driver.
symptoms: The tilt steering lever feels loose
the tilt steering lever does not work at all.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the engine cradle mount can cause the wheels to flop to the side, leading to loss of vehicle control and potentially causing accidents.
The failure of the door handles can prevent occupants from exiting the vehicle in an emergency, posing a serious safety risk.
symptoms: unable to open doors from the outside

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the rear sub-frame mounts can cause the engine to drop onto the rack and pinion, leading to loss of steering control and potentially causing accidents.
symptoms: engine drops onto rack and pinion.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The separation of the dashboard from the console frame can cause distraction and discomfort for the driver, potentially leading to accidents.
